attributes.action: Fund the Leave EU campaign, with the same amount used for the pro-EU leaflet.
attributes.background:
Prime Minister David Cameron has spent millions of tax payer’s money on a pro-EU leaflet. This has been delivered to every household in the UK.
We believe the UK government should give the exactly same amount of money to the Leave EU campaign.

rejection.details: In any case, we wouldn't be able to accept your petition, because the Government and Parliament are not responsible for the issue you raise. The Government does not have the powers to fund the Vote Leave campaign.
